entries.femaleVariant: And don't down every drink they buy you. Even if you do have a fancy filter implant.
But... the bar's gotta make some eds. The boss said we have to get clients to drink.
And she's right. You go to the bathroom with your drink, dump it down the toilet, pour in juice instead.
Look, this is a gig like any other, mostly. You drink on the job anywhere else?
